title: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa - Wikipedia
snippet: On 1 December 2025, Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa was admitted to University Hospital of São João, in Porto, for urgent surgery due to an incarcerated hernia, after feeling unwell.

title: Marcelo Rebelo De Sousa: Latest News, Photos, Videos on Marcelo Rebelo De Sousa - NDTV.COM
snippet: Portuguese President Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa won re-election Sunday, according to media projections and partial results, after a poll held at the height of the country's coronavirus crisis.

title: Portuguese President Rebelo de Sousa hospitalised following emergency surgery | Euronews
snippet: The Portuguese head of state was admitted to hospital late on Monday afternoon "after feeling unwell following digestive issues," but is said to be recovering following an emergency hernia operation.

title: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa | AP News
snippet: Copyright 2025 The Associated Press. All Rights Reserved

title: The President - President of The Republic - Official Information Site of the Presidency of the Portuguese Republic
snippet: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa was elected President of the Republic for the first time on 24 January 2016 and took office on 9 March.
